description.value:
Judged and Found Wanting

You were caught by Imperial justice and punished severely. The marks of your punishment are visible for all to see—perhaps a brand, a missing limb, or crude augmetics that mark you as a criminal.

Effect: You suffer −5 Fellowship. You gain one poor-Craftsmanship bionic limb or implant (you may spend 200 xp to upgrade it to common-Craftsmanship or a total of 300 xp to upgrade it to good-Craftsmanship).

system.benefit: You suffer −5 Fellowship. You gain one poor-Craftsmanship bionic limb or implant.

specialAbilities.name: Poor Bionic
specialAbilities.description: You have one poor-Craftsmanship bionic limb or implant of your choice. You may spend 200 xp to upgrade it to common-Craftsmanship or a total of 300 xp to upgrade it to good-Craftsmanship.
